name: CLUB MALÉ
description:
Welcome to Club Malé 

Relax, have a drink and dance the night away...

Club Malé, your one stop destination to relax, have a drink and dance the night away.

Puking encouraged... only at Club Malé
___________________________________________________

Playable club simulator. Click on different patrons to experience Club Malé through their eyes

Controls:
-  Click on person to follow a patron
-  Press R for birds-eye view
